CustomField.description: Returns net forecast for AI-Enabled opps. Uses Renewal_Net_Change for existing customers (Prior Opp ACV > 0), otherwise BL Quarterly Forecast for new business. Excludes opps where net value is 0 or less.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Eudia_Tech__c, IF(Prior_Opp_ACV__c > 0, Renewal_Net_Change__c, BL_Quarterly_Forecast__c) > 0 ), IF(Prior_Opp_ACV__c > 0, Renewal_Net_Change__c, BL_Quarterly_Forecast__c), 0 )
CustomField.label: AI-Enabled Quarterly Forecast Net
